casebody.data:
No. 10-668. Mary Robyn Priester, Petitioner v. Ford Motor Company. 562 U.S. 1254, 131 S. Ct. 1570,

179 L. Ed. 2d 471,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 1833. February 28, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the Supreme Court of South Carolina for further consideration in light of Williamson v. Mazda Motor of America, Inc., 562 U.S. 323, 131 S. Ct. 1131, 179 L. Ed. 2d 75 (2011).

Same case below, 388 S.C. 425, 697 S.E.2d 567.
